Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Set or update user's cloud budget settings
Scheduled Lambda to check AWS cost and alert users
Scheduled alert processor for budget monitoring
API to fetch cost data from DynamoDB (protected)
Automatically verify user emails in SES after Cognito confirmation
